tool_description: This API returns products, brands, related products and much more from kickscrew
name: KicksCrew Sneakers Data
title: KicksCrew Sneakers Data

api_list.name: Brand Collection
api_list.description:
Get Brand Collection


Parameters:
brand (* required)
hitsPerPage (Default: 16)
page (Default: 0)

Get Product Recommendation

Parameter:
spu (* required) This is the same as model number

api_list.name: Product Description
api_list.description:
Get Product Description

Parameter:
modelNumber (* required)

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description:
get results from search

Parameters:
query (* required)
hitsPerPage (Default: 16)
page (Default: 0)
